channel.title: I need help.....lots
channel.description:
Well ill start out saying i found moparscape 2days ago and thought it looked great me and my friends decided to start a server and i was wondering if i could get some help with the following
1. making a working shop (i can make a non-working one....lol) 2. making moving npc's 3. adding things like WC, Firemaking, etc.
I know there is more i need to know but its best to take things slowly....i use PvPscape(if that matters)
any help would be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: I need help.....lots
item.dc:creator: @zyescape zyescape
item.description:
@zyescape wrote:

yes when i first found mopar i was like omg im gonna make the best server ever becuase mine will be able to do lots of stuff

well if your a nooby like me then things aint so easy

i know the basics but if you want a little help add me on msn : kye_own@hotmail.com

or if you wants some tutorials then go onto:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

there are a lot of tuts here that you can use

i am now o.k at doing my servers lol

zyescape

Read full topic
